name: FXChrome Mac: Windows to Mac
description: It is finally here. You can now use the amazing FXChrome theme on Mac OS X. Pleeeease read the description. Click on the images for a before after.
css:
/********************************************************************************************
 *  ____  __    __   ____   _                                                         .:'
 * |  __| \ \  / /  / ___| | |       _         ____    _              ____        __ :'__
 * | |__   \ \/ /  / /     | |___   | |___    / __ \  | |___ ____    / __ \    .'`  `-'  ``.
 * |  __|   \  /  | |      |  __ \  |  __ \  | |  | | |  __ V __ \  | |__| |  :          .-'
 * | |      /  \  | |      | |  \ \ | |  \_\ | |  | | | |  | |  | | | _____|  :         :
 * | |     / /\ \  \ \___  | |  | | | |      | |__| | | |  | |  | | | \____    :         `-;
 * |_|    /_/  \_\  \____| |_|  |_| |_|       \____/  |_|  |_|  |_|  \____/     `.__.-.__.'
 * 
 * (Apple art was from http://www.ascii-code.com/ascii-art/computers/apple.php)
 * 
 * This Stylish sheet fixes the FXChrome Windows theme to work (mostly) on Mac OS X.
 * 
 * FXChrome by dkgo is my favorite Firefox theme. It helped me switch from the 
 * terrible Chrome for OS X to Firefox. However, at version 33.1, dkgo decided to 
 * abandon the theme for Mac users, saying, 
 *
 *     "do not support Retina Display. sorry..." (Source: https://goo.gl/Lu2r6B).
 *
 * He continued to update the Windows and Linux versions, though, and multiple
 * users have tried to convince him that not all Macs are Retina. Nope. 
 *
 * For a while, I modded 33.1 but was tired of it. This, surprisingly, is easier.
 * 
 *********************************************************************************************
 *                                       
 *                                    *****IMPORTANT!***** 
 *
 *      THIS ADDON REQUIRES THE WINDOWS VERSION OF FXCHROME ENABLED ON FIREFOX FOR MAC OS X.
 *                       IT WILL LOOK _WEIRD_ ON AUSTRALIS. TRUST ME. 
 * 
 *     This theme is recommended for Yosemite or higher. There isn't a real reason you 
 *     shouldn't be on Yosemite or higher. The upgrade is free and it is pretty sweet.
 *      
 *                                       INSTALLATION
 * 
 *         1. Go to FXChrome at the Firefox Addons site. (https://goo.gl/JUxb1s)
 *         2. Hit "Add to Firefox". Ignore that it isn't available for your platform. 
 *                   WE WILL MAKE IT COMPATIBLE WHETHER YOU LIKE IT OR NOT!!! :)
 *         3. Click "Install for Windows anyway". Don't select Linux. 
 *         4. Download Stylish if you haven't already, and enable this style. 
 *         5. Restart Firefox. 
 *
 ***********************************************************************************************
 * 
 *                                        KNOWN ISSUES
 *
 *         • Right-click menu isn't exactly right.
 *         • Please don't use fullscreen. It is currently buggy.
 *         • Color adjustments aren't perfect. I used CSS filters and background replacements
 *           where I could, but some things are still off. 
 *         • Bookmarks Bar
 *         • Private browsing (almost)
 */



@namespace url(http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul);

/** 
 * For some reason, these buttons don't get their list-style-image. Here it is for them.
 */
*:not([place="palette"]) > :-moz-any(#home-button, #print-button, #downloads-button, #bookmarks-menu-button, #new-window-button, #fullscreen-button, #sync-button, #feed-button, #social-share-button, #open-file-button, #find-button, #developer-button, #preferences-button, #privatebrowsing-button, #save-page-button, #add-ons-button, #history-panelmenu, #nav-bar-overflow-button, #PanelUI-menu-button, #characterencoding-button, #email-link-button, #sidebar-button, #zoom-out-button, #zoom-reset-button, #zoom-in-button, #cut-button, #copy-button, #paste-button, #e10s-button, #panic-button, #webide-button, #pocket-button):not([cui-areatype="menu-panel"])/* Items in the menu are fine. */,
#bookmarks-menu-button > .toolbarbutton-menubutton-dropmarker > .dropmarker-icon {
  /* chrome://browser/skin/Toolbar.png doesn't work, this is it in gibberish form. */ 
  list-style-image: url(data:image/png;base64,) !important;

}

/**
 * Customize panel
 */
*[place="palette"] > :-moz-any(#home-button, #print-button, #downloads-button, #bookmarks-menu-button, #new-tab-button, #new-window-button, #fullscreen-button, #sync-button, #feed-button, #social-share-button, #open-file-button, #find-button, #developer-button, #preferences-button, #privatebrowsing-button, #save-page-button, #add-ons-button, #history-panelmenu, #nav-bar-overflow-button, #PanelUI-menu-button, #characterencoding-button, #email-link-button, #sidebar-button, #zoom-out-button, #zoom-reset-button, #zoom-in-button, #cut-button, #copy-button, #paste-button, #e10s-button, #panic-button, #webide-button, #pocket-button):not([cui-areatype="menu-panel"])/* Items in the menu are fine. */{
  /** chrome://browser/skin/menuPanel.png */
  list-style-image: url(data:image/png;base64,)
}
/* These buttons are weird with the list-style-image. They need to be readjusted. */
#cut-button {
-moz-image-region: rect(0px, 504px, 18px, 486px) !important;
}
#copy-button {
  -moz-image-region: rect(0px, 522px, 18px, 504px) !important;
}
#paste-button {
  -moz-image-region: rect(0px, 540px, 18px, 522px) !important;
}
#zoom-out-button {
  -moz-image-region: rect(0px, 558px, 18px, 540px) !important;
}
#zoom-in-button {
  -moz-image-region: rect(0px, 576px, 18px, 558px) !important;
}


/** 
 * Fix the toolbars 
 */
#titlebar, #main-window[sizemode="maximized"] > #titlebar {
  /* Dimensions */
  height: 40px;
  margin-bottom: -29px !important;
}
#main-window:not([privatebrowsingmode="temporary"]) > #titlebar {
 /* Background should be the Mac gradient. */
 -moz-appearance: -moz-window-titlebar !important;
  background: initial !important;
}
#main-window[sizemode="normal"] > #titlebar {
  /* Dimensions are different here. */
  margin-bottom: -21px !important;
}
#main-window[tabsontop][sizemode="maximized"] #TabsToolbar, #main-window[tabsontop][sizemode="normal"] #TabsToolbar {
  /* Extra margins. Weird. */
  margin-top: 0px !important;
}


/** 
 * Window buttons. 
 */
/* Make way for buttons! */
#TabsToolbar {
  padding-left: 68px !important;
}
/* We don't want this to look like anything. */
#titlebar-buttonbox-container {
  -moz-appearance: none!important;
  padding-left: 6px;
  box-sizing: border-box !important;
  position: static !important;
}
/* Stoplights! */
#titlebar-buttonbox {
  -moz-appearance: -moz-window-button-box !important;
  position: sticky !important;
}
/* The Windows-style buttons can be display:none; to get rid of them. */
.titlebar-button, #titlebar-spacer {
  display: none !important;
}
/* Alignment */
#titlebar-content {
  height: 40px !important; 
  display: inline-block;
  width: 26px !important;
  /* Remove extra white space in private browsing */
  margin-top: 0px !important;
}
/* More titlebar stuff */
#main-window:not([privatebrowsingmode="temporary"]) :-moz-any(#titlebar-content, #tab-view-deck) {
  background-color:  transparent !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
}


/**
 * Recoloring to Mac (Yosemite+)
 */
#main-window {
  background-color: initial !important;
}
/**
 * Selected tab background can use a filter to darken it. 
 */
tab[selected="true"] .tab-background-start, tab[selected="true"] .tab-background-end {
  filter: contrast(0.913)
}
/** 
 * The selected tab has some unusual banding, so we use a gradient instead.
 */
tab[selected="true"] .tab-background-middle {
  /* Gradient background */
  background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #efefef, #eaeaea) !important;
  /* The top border. */
  border-top: 1px solid #a0a0a0;
  
  /**
   * For some strange reason, FXChrome uses a -15px margin and 15px border left/right, 
   * and uses -moz-box-sizing: padding-box. We need to change that back for our border
   * to not go off the tab.
   */
  border-radius: 0;
  border-right-width: 0px !important;
  border-left-width: 0px !important;
  margin-right: 0px;
  margin-left: 0px;
  /* The light shine on the top. */
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 0 0 #f6f6f6;
}
tab:not([selected="true"]) .tab-background, .tabs-newtab-button {
  filter: saturate(0) contrast(1.1);
}
/** 
 * *sigh* if only Mozilla would add backdrop-filter... :(
 * 
 * Changes the URL bar backround with a gradient.
 */
#nav-bar {
  background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, #eaeaea, #d7d7d7);
}


/**
 * URL Bar and Search Bar
 */
#urlbar, #searchbar .searchbar-textbox {
  /* Round corners */
  border-radius: 3px !important;
  /* Border/inset shadow */
  border: 1px solid #9f9d9d;
  box-shadow:  0px 1px 0 #f6f6f6, inset 0px 1px 0px #e7e7e7;

  /* Realignment */
  padding-top: 1px !important;
}
#urlbar[focused="true"], #searchbar .searchbar-textbox[focused="true"] {
  border-color: -moz-mac-focusring !important;
  box-shadow: 0 0 1.5px 1px -moz-mac-focusring !important;
}



/**
 * Fix the right-click menus. They have weird padding and highlight colors. 
 * 
 * Basically copying. :|
 */
*:not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup) menuseparator {
  -moz-appearance: menuseparator;
  margin-top: 5px;
  margin-right: 0px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  margin-left: 0px;
  padding-top: 1px;
  padding-right: 0px;
  padding-bottom: 1px;
  padding-left: 0px;
}
*:not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup) :-moz-any(menu, menuitem, menucaption) {
  -moz-appearance: menuitem;
  -moz-box-align: center;
  color: menutext;
  list-style-image: none;
  -moz-image-region: auto;
  padding-top: 0px;
  padding-bottom: 2px;
}
:-moz-any(menu, menuitem, menucaption)[disabled="true"] {
  color: graytext;
}
*:not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup) menupopup:not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup) > arrowscrollbox {
  border-radius: 4px !important;
}
menupopup:not([hidden="true"]):not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup)  {
  -moz-appearance: menupopup !important;
  background-color: menu !important;
  display: -moz-popup !important;
}
description, label {
  margin-top: 1px;
  margin-bottom: 2px;
  margin-inline-start: 6px;
  margin-inline-end: 5px;
}
.popup-internal-box {
  padding-top: 4px;
  padding-right: 0px;
  padding-bottom: 4px;
  padding-left: 0px;
}
*:not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup) .popup-internal-box > autorepeatbutton {
  height: 15px;
  position: relative;
  list-style-image: none;
  -moz-appearance: menuitem;
}
.popup-internal-box > .autorepeatbutton-down {
  padding-top: 5px;
  margin-top: -15px;
}
.popup-internal-box > .autorepeatbutton-up {
  padding-top: 1px;
  margin-bottom: -15px;
}
/* Hover color */
*:not(#BMB_bookmarksPopup) > :-moz-any(menu, menuitem, menucaption):not([disabled="true"]):hover {
  color: white !important;
  
}
menuitem[type="checkbox"] > .menu-iconic-left > .menu-iconic-icon,
menuitem[checked="true"] > .menu-iconic-left > .menu-iconic-icon,
menuitem[type="radio"] > .menu-iconic-left > .menu-iconic-icon {
  display: block !important;
}
menuitem[checked="true"] > .menu-iconic-left > .menu-iconic-icon {
  background: url('chrome://global/skin/menu/shared-menu-check.png')
}


/**
 * Cleaning up the Downloads.
 */
#downloads-indicator-progress, .downloadProgress {
  border-radius: 4px !important;
  overflow: hidden !important;
  background-color: threedshadow;
  z-index: 999;
  -moz-appearance: progressbar !important;
}
#downloads-indicator-progress {
  margin-top: -4px !important;
}
.downloadButton {
  padding-top: 32px !important;
}
#downloads-indicator-progress > .progress-remainder {
  background-color: #B8B8B8 !important;
  z-index: -2 !important;
}


/**
 * Private Browsing cleanup. It isn't perfect.
 */
#main-window[privatebrowsingmode="temporary"] :-moz-any(#titlebar-content, #tab-view-deck) {
  background-color: rgb(85, 111, 149) !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
}
#main-window[privatebrowsingmode="temporary"] > #titlebar {
  -moz-appearance: -moz-window-titlebar !important;
  background-color: rgb(85, 111, 149) !important;
}
/* URL bar and search bar shading */
#main-window[privatebrowsingmode="temporary"] #urlbar, 
#main-window[privatebrowsingmode="temporary"] #searchbar .searchbar-textbox {
  border: 1px solid #888;
  box-shadow:  0px 1px 0 #e7e7e7, inset 0px 1px 0px #585858;
}
/* The private browsing indicator */
#main-window[privatebrowsingmode="temporary"] .private-browsing-indicator {
  /* It doesn't actually show for some reason. */
  display: inline-block;
  /* Positioning */
  margin-top: -3px !important;
  margin-right: -2px !important;
  /* Cut from chrome://browser/content/menuPanel.png using list-image-position of it in the menu. */
  background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
  /* That one is a little too big. */
  background-size: 24px 24px;
}


/**
 * Bookmarks
 */
#bookmarks-menu-button > toolbarbutton {
  -moz-appearance: none !important;
}
#BMB_bookmarksPopup:not([hidden="true"]), #BMB_bookmarksPopup:not([hidden="true"]) menupopup {
  -moz-appearance: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  display: -moz-popup;
  -moz-box-sizing: border-box !important;
  list-style-image: none !important;
  background: none !important;
  border: none !important;
  
}
#BMB_bookmarksPopup menu {
  background-color: white;
}
